data.text: @theAliceRoberts @dgurdasani1 My 12 year old has had 1 jab and I have no problem with her having the second.
@readthinkwalk @dgurdasani1 It’s a much under reported effect of COVID-19 that it brings out the worst in some people and the best in others. Curious.
@AIthemarAms @dgurdasani1 malice too no, by the anti-vaxxers?

@serialdeviant @theAliceRoberts @dgurdasani1 It is safer to elbow bump as fist bumping can spread the virus. Or to do the "self hug" sign with no touch. The more we stay apart the closer we become 🤗❤️ #itsjustamask #dotherightthing

@emmakennytv @dgurdasani1 No response @emmakennytv ?
Throw around allegations of criminality, claim to care about following evidence but refuse to engage with it when it's provided?

@dgurdasani1 Have you seen Pfizers data???

https://t.co/lyBgNvqj4X
@theAliceRoberts @dgurdasani1 Many parents, including you, will regret this decision
@emmakennytv @dgurdasani1 What do "need" and "necessary" have to do with it? The reason vaccines are offered is because their benefits outweigh their risks/harms. "Need" doesn't really come into it.
